content:
I've narrowed down a CI failure to the 7/29 nightly: https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/issues/8568

What's a next step I can take to further narrow down the culprit? Any sense if this is a cargo/rustup regression? How do we tell what version of cargo is included in a particular nightly rust bundle?
-Zbuild-std should be fixed shortly in nightly
